incidents.name: Degraded Verify Deliverability Rates in China

incidents.name: Message Status Update Failures Affecting MMS Messages for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers and are still working to deploy a fix. The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 11 October 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 12 October 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 12 October 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 12 October 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 12 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy.
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy.
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 October 2023 at 15:30 PDT until 12 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Colombia is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 13 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio’s Colombia phone numbers

Our Voice carrier partner in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 October 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 14 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio’s Indonesia phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 17 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

The DTAC network in Thailand is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 October 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from DTAC Thailand handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 October 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - XOX Malaysia

incident_updates.body: The XOX Malaysia network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 October 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 19 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XOX Malaysia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia Messaging Carrier Maintenance - U Mobile

incident_updates.body: The U Mobile Network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 October 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 19 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering messaging to and from U Mobile Network Malaysia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 02:00 PDT until 24 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US short code.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Verizon

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from from 24 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 24 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Verizon network in the US when sending via shortcode.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth
Lookup Identity Match
Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

The Yoigo network in Spain is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 10 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yoigo Spain handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 10 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 11 October 2023 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
04 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 04 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
09 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 09 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
11 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 11 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
16 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
18 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
23 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 23 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
25 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
30 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
